animation

Interface Animation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountdownAnimation, GameLevel, PauseScreen

    public interface Animation
    Interface for animation classes.
    Author:
    Tomer Davidor, Guy Blachar

        Checks the stopping conditions for the game.
